channel.title: Tips
channel.description:

What should I do with this account in terms of Magic?

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:

zezima was white. he ruled runescape for years.

item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:

Turn it into a mage boxer. O.o

I haven’t a clue what you mean by that. I’ve never been one for staking.

Any tips?
[/quote]
Become asian and instantly gain a gaming lvl of 99. With that, you will rule Runescape. ;)[/quote]

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:22, topic:437515”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=540221.msg3955931#msg3955931 date=1332744812]
having 99 hp is pointless except for the aesthetic in a pure (not viable in combat), so there’s no real reason NOT to train magic. Especially since it’s a very versatile skill.
[/quote]

Magic levels combat though. I just said it ruined the account because a 99 HP pure with combat stats of 1 is quite rare.[/quote]I know, which is why I said ‘except for the aesthetic’ It’s not like he can go back to level 1 though, so there’s no point not leveling it further.

Read full topic

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Davidi2:

having 99 hp is pointless except for the aesthetic in a pure (not viable in combat), so there’s no real reason NOT to train magic. Especially since it’s a very versatile skill.

Magic levels combat though. I just said it ruined the account because a 99 HP pure with combat stats of 1 is quite rare.

Read full topic

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Depends on your intentions. If you plan on using mage as your primary means of combat, just go for 99.

Some other goals that help with skills etc
55 - high alchemy
67 - npc contact (after Lunar dip)
77 - glass make
80 - string jewlery
83 - fertile soil/make leather
86 - plank make

Read full topic

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:

Davidi2:

having 99 hp is pointless except for the aesthetic in a pure (not viable in combat), so there’s no real reason NOT to train magic. Especially since it’s a very versatile skill.

First valid point. Any level you specifically recommend I train to?

Read full topic

having 99 hp is pointless except for the aesthetic in a pure (not viable in combat), so there’s no real reason NOT to train magic. Especially since it’s a very versatile skill.

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:17, topic:437515”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=540221.msg3955867#msg3955867 date=1332740688]

The magic ruined the account…

Yes, because we all know that the best accounts are pure skillers.
No, I’m sorry, that’s incorrect. There is no way to ‘ruin’ an account by getting skills, unless it is a pure of combat type and you raise a different combat type (making it impossible to pk).

99 HP != Pure skiller. Derps.

(Pure skiller || whatever this shit is) != useful. Derps.
[/quote]

I said "the magic ruined the account.

You said “Yes, because we all know the best accounts are pure skillers”, implying that the magic made it a non-pure-skiller.

I stated that it wasn’t a pure skiller to begin with, with 99 HP.[/quote]
And I said that the magic did not ruin the account, because having magic at 1 did not provide any use.

Read full topic

99 HP != Pure skiller. Derps.
[/quote]

(Pure skiller || whatever this shit is) != useful. Derps.[/quote]

I said "the magic ruined the account.

You said “Yes, because we all know the best accounts are pure skillers”, implying that the magic made it a non-pure-skiller.

item.title: Tips
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

You lost me at 59.

[quote=“krackkid, post:5, topic:437515”]You need to get level 54, Then after you get level 54 get 55, Then get 56 after that, then 57, then 58, then 60, then 61, then 62, then 63, then 64, then 65, then 66, then 67, then 68, then 69, then 70, then 71, then 72, then 73, then 74, then 75, then 76, then 77, then 78, then 79, then 80, then 81, then 82, then 83, then 84, then 85, then 86, then 87, then 88, then 89, then 90, then 91, then 92, then 93, then 94, then 95, then 96, then 97, then 98, then 99. Then ! You will be set to level up mage.

Hope this helps you.[/quote]

Read full topic
